pageProduct.name: Savlon Antiseptic Cream for Cuts Grazes Bites 50g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Savlon Antiseptic Cream helps nature heal.

Savlon Antiseptic Cream contains effective germ-killing and cleansing agents. Savlon's smooth moisturising cream base allows gentle application onto damaged skin.


Savlon Antiseptic Cream is mild, soothing and healing.


Use on cuts, scratches, blisters, grazes, windburn, sunburn, insect bites, cracked and itchy skin.

Size: 50g

Ingredients

Contains: Chlorhexidine Hydrochloride 1mg/g, Cetrimide 5mg/g. Preservatives: Hydroxybenzoates 1.4mg/g, Phenoxyethanol 3.6mg/g.

Directions

Pierce tube seal with point in top of cap. For general use clean the surrounding skin and apply Savlon directly or on a piece of lint or cotton wool. For external use only. Not for use on children younger than 3 years of age. Avoid contact with eyes, ears, nose and mouth. If in eyes, rinse well with water. If swallowed, contact a doctor. Not for use on open head or neck wounds, deep wounds, in the genital area or on the breast if breast feeding. Mild irritation may occur, stop use if it becomes severe and seek medical advice. Do not use if hypersensitive to Chlorhexidine Hydrochloride or Cetrimide.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C
